name: Cosmonauta
description:
Cosmonauta is a platform game in which players must overcome a world full of challenging puzzles, which require more than their reflexes, their determination.
During a space expedition, our hero experiences issues with the navigation systems on his ship and now needs to face the dangers of the unknown to find his way back home.
 
Main Features:

Graphics inspired by the classics of the 8 and 16-bit era
64 Levels full of challenging puzzles
Easy to play, difficult to master
